name: Organizations, Charitable and Social Service
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for non–face-to-face transactions.
description:
Charitable (non-political) organizations that solicit contributions,
social service organizations that provide social welfare services,
advocacy groups, community organizations, and health agencies.
Use a TCC of T for fundraising performed through non–face-to-face
methods such as phone orders.
